statements: SELECT * FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, order_id, product_name FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, quantity, product_id FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, quantity, order_date FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_id FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE customer_id = 200 AND product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE order_id = 456 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, quantity FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE product_id = 789 AND quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE product_name LIKE '%Apple%' ORDER BY order_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, order_id FROM crm_erp_integration WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM CRM;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CRM WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM CRM ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ERP WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT system_id, system_name, system_description FROM OtherSystems;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CRM WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM ERP WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT system_name, system_description FROM OtherSystems WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM CRM c INNER JOIN ERP e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT insight_description, system_name FROM BusinessInsights bi INNER JOIN OtherSystems os ON bi.system_id = os.system_id WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data;
SELECT product_name, price FROM erp_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, description FROM other_system_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM erp_data WHERE price > 100 AND price < 500;
SELECT id, customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT id, category, date_added FROM other_system_data WHERE date_added >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM erp_data WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, data_category, data_value FROM crm_data JOIN other_system_data ON crm_data.customer_id = other_system_data.data_id;
SELECT * FROM crm_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM erp_data WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM crm_data JOIN erp_data ON crm_data.customer_id = erp_data.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT data_value, insight_description FROM other_system_data AS osd JOIN business_insights AS bi ON osd.data_id = bi.data_id WHERE bi.customer_id = 200 ORDER BY data_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM CRM;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ERP WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM CRM WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM ERP ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
